abilities.name: Anti
abilities.effect: Lightning - You can't attach Lightning Energy cards from your hand to Zapdos.

attacks.name: Plasma
attacks.effect: If there are any Energy cards in your discard pile, flip a coin. If heads attach 1 of those Energy cards to Zapdos.

attacks.name: Lightning Storm
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, put 2 damage counters on Zapdos.
